trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around May 1st 1994
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile on a drive to Las Vegas, Nevada from Orange County, California via car with three other witnesses in the car. We stopped at a rest stop in Nevada a couple hours drive West of Las Vegas. The driver of the car, as well as two other witnesses observed a large unidentified flying object hovering over our location. It is difficult to estimate the elevation of the craft or its approximate size. It had no lights, nor other observable markings. The craft seemed to be "invisible" and what we observed was a dark object that silhouetted stars and such as it moved slowly almost hovering over our location. We observed the object for nearly a half hour, before becoming spooked and leaving the location.
Summary: Large unidentified object hovering over car
